data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Membership with Included Services. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Hybrid Classroom (In-Person + Remote). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
